Html:
I installed KiGG few months back but RSS Feed URL is not working properly. The site is hosted with ORCSWeb.

http://dotnetalbum.com/content/Feed/Atom/Published (Error)

Following error is displayed when I burn the RSS Feed using feedburner.

Received HTTP error: "Internal Server Error" while fetching source feed.

I would like to know whether any user of KiGG encountered this error? If so how to fix this?

Regards,

Anand N

An Exclusive Directory for .NET Geeks

I'm sorry, I failed tracing this error. Locally the feed works fine!
Will try to trace it again. If I come up with something will get back to you.

Thanks. How can I migrate my site to another server?

I attempted to migrate to discountasp but not working.

Please let me know the process.

Anand
I fixed the problem by reuploading config files.
